items.prompt: Задание: She went to the store. She wanted to buy milk. → She went to the store _____.?
items.answer: She went to the store to buy milk.

items.prompt: Задание: I called him. I wanted to invite him to the party. → I called him _____.?
items.answer: I called him to invite him to the party.

items.prompt: Задание: We are saving money. We want to buy a house. → We are saving money _____.?
items.answer: We are saving money to buy a house.

items.prompt: Задание: He woke up early. He wanted to catch the first train. → He woke up early _____.?
items.answer: He woke up early to catch the first train.

items.prompt: Задание: They hired a lawyer. They wanted to handle the case. → They hired a lawyer _____.?
items.answer: They hired a lawyer to handle the case.

items.prompt: Задание: I'm learning English. I want to study abroad. → I'm learning English _____.?
items.answer: I'm learning English to study abroad.

items.prompt: Задание: She exercised regularly. She wanted to stay fit. → She exercised regularly _____.?
items.answer: She exercised regularly to stay fit.

items.prompt: Задание: We arrived early. We wanted to get good seats. → We arrived early _____.?
items.answer: We arrived early to get good seats.

items.prompt: Задание: He worked overtime. He wanted to finish the project. → He worked overtime _____.?
items.answer: He worked overtime to finish the project.

items.prompt: Задание: I'm taking cooking classes. I want to become a chef. → I'm taking cooking classes _____.?
items.answer: I'm taking cooking classes to become a chef.

items.prompt: Задание: They moved to the countryside. They wanted to enjoy a quieter life. → They moved to the countryside _____.?
items.answer: They moved to the countryside to enjoy a quieter life.

items.prompt: Задание: She practised every day. She wanted to improve her skills. → She practiced every day _____.?
items.answer: She practised every day to improve her skills.

items.prompt: Задание: We're saving up. We want to travel around the world. → We're saving up _____.?
items.answer: We're saving up to travel around the world.

items.prompt: Задание: He studied hard. He wanted to pass the exam. → He studied hard _____.?
items.answer: He studied hard to pass the exam.

items.prompt: Задание: I'm learning to drive. I want to be more independent. → I'm learning to drive _____.?
items.answer: I'm learning to drive to be more independent.

items.prompt: Задание: The coffee / hot / drink.?
items.answer: The coffee is too hot to drink.

items.prompt: Задание: She / young / drive.?
items.answer: She is too young to drive.

items.prompt: Задание: The music / loud / concentrate.?
items.answer: The music is too loud to concentrate.

items.prompt: Задание: He / tall / reach the top shelf.?
items.answer: He is tall enough to reach the top shelf.

items.prompt: Задание: The puzzle / difficult / solve.?
items.answer: The puzzle is too difficult to solve.

items.prompt: Задание: I / tired / go out.?
items.answer: I am too tired to go out.

items.prompt: Задание: The box / heavy / lift.?
items.answer: The box is too heavy to lift.

items.prompt: Задание: They / busy / attend the meeting.?
items.answer: They are too busy to attend the meeting.

items.prompt: Задание: The water / cold / swim.?
items.answer: The water is too cold to swim.

items.prompt: Задание: She / smart / understand the concept.?
items.answer: She

items.prompt: Задание: I'm happy _____ (meet) you finally. We've been corresponding for months.?
items.answer: I'm happy to meet you finally.

items.prompt: Задание: The package seems _____ (deliver) yesterday.?
items.answer: The package seems to have been delivered yesterday.

items.prompt: Задание: He claims _____ (work) on this project for over a year now.?
items.answer: He claims to have been working on this project for over a year now.

items.prompt: Задание: The house needs _____ (paint) before we move in.?
items.answer: The house needs to be painted before we move in.

items.prompt: Задание: I expect _____ (finish) this book by next week.?
items.answer: I expect to finish this book by next week.

items.prompt: Задание: She appears _____ (study) all night; she looks exhausted.?
items.answer: She appears to have been studying all night; she looks exhausted.

items.prompt: Задание: They hope _____ (invite) to the wedding.?
items.answer: They hope to be invited to the wedding.

items.prompt: Задание: He pretends _____ (not hear) what I said.?
items.answer: He pretends not to have heard what I said.

items.prompt: Задание: The concert was said _____ (attend) by thousands of fans.?
items.answer: The concert was said to have been attended by thousands of fans.

items.prompt: Задание: I would like _____ (travel) around the world someday.?
items.answer: I would like to travel around the world someday.

items.prompt: Задание: The suspect is believed _____ (hide) in the abandoned building.?
items.answer: The suspect is believed to be hiding in the abandoned building.

items.prompt: Задание: She seems _____ (recover) from her illness now.?
items.answer: She seems to be recovering from her illness now.

items.prompt: Задание: We're planning _____ (move) to a new house next month.?
items.answer: We're planning to move to a new house next month.

items.prompt: Задание: The movie is reported _____ (see) by millions of people worldwide.?
items.answer: The movie is reported to have been seen by millions of people worldwide.

items.prompt: Задание: He admits _____ (make) a mistake in his calculations.?
items.answer: He admits to having made a mistake in his calculations.

items.prompt: Задание: I _____ to help you with your homework. (want / enjoy / avoid)?
items.answer: I want to help you with your homework.

items.prompt: Задание: They _____ to arrive on time for the meeting. (pretend / manage / keep)?
items.answer: They manage to arrive on time for the meeting.

items.prompt: Задание: She _____ to tell him the truth about what happened. (decide / finish / prefer)?
items.answer: She decided to tell him the truth about what happened.

items.prompt: Задание: We _____ to visit Paris next summer. (plan / deny / risk)?
items.answer: We plan to visit Paris next summer.

items.prompt: Задание: He _____ to apologize for his behavior. (refuse / tend / seem)?
items.answer: He refused to apologize for his behavior.

items.prompt: Задание: I _____ to understand the complex theory. (struggle / enjoy / avoid)?
items.answer: I struggle to understand the complex theory.

items.prompt: Задание: They _____ to offer me the job. (agree / finish / appear)?
items.answer: They agreed to offer me the job.

items.prompt: Задание: She _____ to learn a new language every year. (try / admit / manage)?
items.answer: She tries to learn a new language every year.

items.prompt: Задание: We _____ to meet your parents next week. (expect / avoid / deny)?
items.answer: We expect to meet your parents next week.

items.prompt: Задание: He _____ to help with the project. (volunteer / enjoy / risk)?
items.answer: He volunteered to help with the project.

items.prompt: Задание: I _____ to finish the report by Friday. (promise / admit / tend)?
items.answer: I promise to finish the report by Friday.

items.prompt: Задание: They _____ to invest in the new business. (hesitate / manage / decide)?
items.answer: They decided to invest in the new business.

items.prompt: Задание: She _____ to arrive late for work. (tend / enjoy / refuse)?
items.answer: She tends to arrive late for work.

items.prompt: Задание: We _____ to understand his point of view. (try / admit / risk)?
items.answer: We try to understand his point of view.

items.prompt: Задание: He _____ to be the best candidate for the position. (claim / enjoy / avoid)?
items.answer: He claims to be the best candidate for the position.

items.prompt: Задание: Искам да ти помогна с домашното.?
items.answer: I want to help you with your homework.

items.prompt: Задание: Тя се опитва да научи нов език.?
items.answer: She is trying to learn a new language.

items.prompt: Задание: Те планират да посетят Париж следващото лято.?
items.answer: They are planning to visit Paris next summer.

items.prompt: Задание: Важно е да учиш усилено за изпитите.?
items.answer: It is important to study hard for the exams.

items.prompt: Задание: Той отказа да се извини за поведението си.?
items.answer: He refused to apologize for his behaviour.

items.prompt: Задание: Ние решихме да се преместим в нов град.?
items.answer: We decided to move to a new city.

items.prompt: Задание: Тя се преструва, че не разбира въпроса.?
items.answer: She pretends not to understand the question.

items.prompt: Задание: Децата обещаха да се държат добре на партито.?
items.answer: The children promised to behave well at the party.

items.prompt: Задание: Аз се надявам да завърша проекта до петък.?
items.answer: I hope to finish the project by Friday.

items.prompt: Задание: Те очакват да пристигнат на летището в 18:00 часа.?
items.answer: They expect to arrive at the airport at 6 PM.

items.prompt: Задание: Той изглежда много уморен днес.?
items.answer: He seems to be very tired today.

items.prompt: Задание: Ние се съгласихме да се срещнем в ресторанта.?
items.answer: We agreed to meet at the restaurant.

items.prompt: Задание: Тя мечтае да стане известна актриса някой ден.?
items.answer: She dreams of becoming a famous actress someday.

items.prompt: Задание: Аз забравих да заключа вратата, когато излязох.?
items.answer: I forgot to lock the door when I left.

items.prompt: Задание: Те предложиха да ни помогнат с преместването.?
items.answer: They offered to help us with the move.

items.prompt: Задание: Ние се опитваме да решим този труден математически проблем.?
items.answer: We are trying to solve this difficult math problem.

items.prompt: Задание: Той се колебае да инвестира в новия бизнес.?
items.answer: He hesitates to invest in the new business.

items.prompt: Задание: Тя има навика да закъснява за работа.?
items.answer: She has a habit of being late for work.

items.prompt: Задание: Ние се стремим да разберем неговата гледна точка.?
items.answer: We strive to understand his point of view

items.prompt: Задание: Тя иска да научи как да свири на пиано.?
items.answer: She wants to learn how to play the piano.

items.prompt: Задание: Той се опитва да реши сложния проблем.?
items.answer: He is trying to solve the complex problem.

items.prompt: Задание: Ние планираме да организираме парти за рождения си ден.?
items.answer: We are planning to organize a party for my birthday.

items.prompt: Задание: Тя мечтае да пътува по света.?
items.answer: She dreams of travelling around the world.

items.prompt: Задание: Аз се надявам да премина изпита.?
items.answer: I hope to pass the exam.

items.prompt: Задание: Те отказаха да участват в проекта.?
items.answer: They refused to participate in the project.

items.prompt: Задание: Той обеща да се обади след работа.?
items.answer: He promised to call after work.

items.prompt: Задание: Ние се надяваме да видим любимия си отбор да спечели.?
items.answer: We hope to see our favorite team win.

items.prompt: Задание: Тя не иска да пропусне възможността.?
items.answer: She doesn't want to miss the opportunity.

items.prompt: Задание: Те обичат да играят футбол в парка.?
items.answer: They love to play football in the park.

items.prompt: Задание: Аз съм решил да започна ново хоби.?
items.answer: I have decided to start a new hobby.
